tool_description: This api provides 'real-time' demographic statistics. Check out 'Counters' endpoint that provides the list of data (counters) that can be obtained. Viable alternative for countrymeters  or worldometers.
name: Real-time Statistics
title: Real-time Statistics

api_list.name: Counter
api_list.description: Pick a counter from the "Counters" endpoint then use this endpoint to get the stats
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://real-time-statistics.p.rapidapi.com/counters/births"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "real-time-statistics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://real-time-statistics.p.rapidapi.com/counters/{counter}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "real-time-statistics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Counters
api_list.description: List of counters -> a list of all possible stats u can get
